basics.name: Jason Fakidis
basics.label: Electrical and Computer Engineer
basics.summary: Recent graduate in electrical and computer engineering from the University of British Columbia

highlights: Self started a new intranet website from scratch by designing the complete information architecture and layout

Optimized vehicle quality control process by conducting a Structured Decision Making (SDM) study. Researched and implemented an optial solution for handwritten digitization and organization of quality control documents
Coordinated strategic meetings withs managers two and three levels above my position to communicate best practices for website design and to inform on technial matters
Conducted 2 weekly migrations from a local developement environment to a live server ensuring accuracy in a self-directed environment
Modifiet HTML and CSS files within an existing Wordpress theme for customization saving hundreds of dollars in consulting fees
Provided technical guidance to management for better decision making

Designed and produced a complete set of mechanical designs for an optical transmission system for particle beam imaging compatible with ultra high vaccuum while working closely with on-site design engineers to ensure accuracy
Wrote python software to simulate electric field gradients within a vacuum and average spin polarizations of lattice constituents within an exotic material
Demonstrated excellent self direction by completing requirements with minimal superior consultation

work.company: Djavad Mowafaghian Centre for Brain Health
highlights: Designed and modelled electroporation chambers in Solidwords used to contain tadpoles during a neurophysiological research process
Integrated power supply circuitry into an existing optical system to drive a series of rotating mirrors
Reverse engineered a pre-manufactured confocl dichroic microscope and laser system to identify points of failure
Designed and assembled a dissolution system for the removal of irradiated materials from chemically etched plates
Programmed a Human Machine Interface (HMI) using C# and integrated it into an existing automation server for use by operators on a daily basis
Collaborated effectively with project engineers to plan and meet project deliverables on schedule and within scope

volunteer.summary: Senior leadership responsible for complete operations of the branch
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
